pre_caption: The video starts with a medium close-up of a man in the foreground, positioned slightly left of center. A light-colored mantelpiece edge is visible in the middle ground, running horizontally across the lower portion of the frame. The background features an opulent room with out-of-focus candlelight creating bokeh effects, primarily in the top right and center. The camera then executes a rack focus, causing the man in the foreground to blur while bringing into focus the reflection of a woman in a large mirror that occupies the background. Her reflected head and shoulders are positioned slightly to the right of the mirror's center and in the upper-middle of the overall frame. In-focus candles become visible in the background, both directly in the room (top right) and within the mirror's reflection, notably to the right of the woman. Ornate, gilded wall details frame the mirror in the background. The camera is positioned at the subject's level.
